articles.content: Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation (DICGC) has released a list of 21 banks whose account holders will likely get up to Rs 5 lakh according to a statement released by it. The operation… [+2944 chars]

articles.title: Infosys shares updates on progress made on Income Tax portal - Mint

articles.description: Tejas will supply, install and support its state-of-the-art TJ1600 DWDM/OTN products for extending Airtel’s optical networks.
articles.content:

articles.author: Brinda Sarkar
articles.title: New parents at Meesho to get 30 weeks of gender-neutral leave - Economic Times
articles.description: Not only the new leave policy applies equally to women, men, heterogenous or same-sex couples so they can stay present for their children but it also does away with the differentiation between natural childbirth, adoption, and surrogacy.
articles.content: Social commerce platform Meesho has rolled out a 30-week gender-neutral parental leave policy, in an effort to ensure non-discriminatory benefits irrespective of employees gender or sexual identity. … [+1211 chars]
